medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Acute onset of abdominal pain and nausea developed 1 day prior to presentation. No recent diarrhea, fevers, or chills reported. The patient's condition worsened with deterioration in mental status and episodes of vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: COPD on 3L home O2, history of lung cancer s/p lobectomy, CAD s/p carotid endarterectomy with TIAs, s/p aorto-bifem bypass, s/p AAA open repair, dementia, type 2 diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, degenerative joint disease, s/p hernia repair, s/p total abdominal hysterectomy.
